description.en: Applies a ladder notch filter with alternating stereo beeps to an audio file.
description.nl: Past een ladder notch filter toe met afwisselende stereo piepjes op een audiobestand.

start_freq_description.en: Starting frequency of the ladder filter

end_freq_description.en: Ending frequency of the ladder filter

q_factor_description.en: Quality factor of the notch filter

filter_mix_ratio_description.en: Mixing ratio for the filtered audio

beep_mix_ratio_description.en: Mixing ratio for the stereo beep
